title: Trillium 02 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


Trillium 2

By:   	Jeff Lemire	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Horror
Publisher:   	DC Comics, Vertigo	
Pub. Date:  	September 04, 2013
Format:         CBZ
For ages:  	16+

In the heart of the Amazon jungle, Nika, a scientist from the year 3797, and William, an explorer from 1921, struggle not only to survive but to make sense of the mind-bending events that have pulled them together across space and time. The mysteries continue to pile up as Vertigo's new sci-fi epic launches into high gear!
